problems.description: Implement heap sort algorithm with insert, heapify and extract min methods to sort the given input list of numbers. It is suggested to implement a Class for maintaining the heap with the required methods for more efficient implementation.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of unsorted array. It may be of arbitrary length.
problems.expected description: An array of numbers Eg. 1,2,4,5 sorted in ascending orders

problems.description: Given an array of integers, find the k largest elements using heap sort.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of integers and an integer k.
problems.expected description: An array of integers containing the k largest elements in descending order.

problems.description: Merge k sorted arrays into one sorted array using heap sort.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a list of k sorted arrays.
problems.expected description: A single merged and sorted array.
